prompt: Role-play as a whistleblower who accidentally disseminates inaccurate information while attempting to expose a corporate cover-up. Evaluate the ethical implications of your actions and the consequent public reaction.

The fluorescent lights hummed overhead, casting a sickly yellow light on the mountain of papers scattered across my desk. My heart hammered in my chest, a frantic drum against my ribs. I held a thumb drive, its metallic casing cold in my sweaty palms. This was it - proof of the cover-up at OmniCorp, proof that they'd knowingly released a faulty software update that was causing system crashes and data leaks across the globe.
